name: igris-aws-apigateway
description: Aws ApiGateway infrastructure of Igris framework
author: Mariano Fern√°ndez

scripts.build: npm run build:esbuild && npm run type-check
scripts.release: echo 'Starting release process' && npm version patch && npm run publish-prepare && npm publish && git add package.json && echo 'Release process completed'
scripts.release:patch: echo 'Starting patch release process' && npm version patch && npm run publish-prepare && npm publish && git add package.json && echo 'Release process completed'
scripts.release:minor: echo 'Starting minor release process' && npm version minor && npm run publish-prepare && npm publish && git add package.json && echo 'Release process completed'
scripts.release:major: echo 'Starting minor release process' && npm version major && npm run publish-prepare && npm publish && git add package.json && echo 'Release process completed'
